description:
One day, Dad says he wants to make the legendary Kamo curry. He had it once in India, long ago, and sets off on a gastronomical journey to relive the experience. Bunji is acting really down. He has a tooth that is about to fall out, but he mistakes it for being sick. Mom tries to explain to him that it only hurts until it falls out and then it feels better, but... "I... fell in love." Grandma is obsessed with the mature Korean TV star, Yong-sama. She tells Mom she wants her to buy her the DVDs of a Korean drama that Yong-sama stars in... Bunji and Fumi go shopping by themselves for the first time, with Mom`s permission. Since she said they can buy whatever they want with their allowance, they skip off merrily to the supermarket. However...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Legendary Curry / Grandma`s Love / Tooth Came Out / Two Going Shopping
伝説のカリー / ばあちゃんの恋 / 歯がぬけた / 二人でおつかい
